cab.content: jT2.SBCREB, WAB OABIHEg.G. T. 1803.A. HE ZIOHIS? MOVEMENT.Alternative, by Lord Milner, to Draft Declaration. See II of Paper 1803.Draft Declaration."His Majesty'3 Government accepts the principle that "every opportunity should be afforded for the establishment "of a home for the Jewish people in Palestine, and will use "its best endeavours to facilitate the achievement of this "object, and will he ready to consider any suggestions on "the subject which the Zionist organisations may desire to "lay before them".* ******** n ** * * ***** *
